website_summaries.verdict: This is a terrific set of wind chimes, and you will likely be pleased, but it's hard to say this beats either the Capiz or Amazing Grace sets.
pros: Makes music in the faintest of breezes
The six chimes are large, but also lightweight
The unit is sturdy and built well
cons: Light construction may be a concern
The string holding the chimes is thin, and staples are used to secure the string at the top

customer_reviews.title: Good size, nice sound.
customer_reviews.text: Good size, nice sound. I was a bit skeptical about buying this at first because I have had a few chimes in the past that have an annoying sound like shrill little yapping dogs. This has a nice booming sound quality which I like very much. The poltergeists in my house love playing it too (check out the video).
customer_reviews.author: Chuckles, the Ferocious Chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Outstanding quality. Even the box! Update: So we bought this in May and now in September, it's in pieces. Thought at first it was just broken in half and was taking it down to figure out how to fix it when it just fell apart in my hand. 10.25.17 UPDATE: Changed review to 3 stars as they replaced my chime. This time I'm spraying it with a clear glaze to protect the wood. Let's see how long it lasts this time!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.  Fell apart in one year.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one year and fell apart. Finish lasted only months. You get what you pay for I suppose. I have Woodstock chimes that have been hanging out for 2 years longer and still holding up well. I will replace it with another Woodstock.
customer_reviews.author: Richard in Charlotte, NC

customer_reviews.title: It comes beautifully packaged, perfect for gift-giving
customer_reviews.text: The sound of these chimes is most Zen-like...so soothing. It comes beautifully packaged, perfect for gift-giving. It's big and impressive...but definitely the sound of these chimes is the most amazing...LOVE THEM!!! UPDATE: My chimes still look good, albeit, a little grimy as it's rained a lot this winter and I haven't cleaned them, but overall, pretty good! The wood has weathered quite a bit being in full sunlight most of the time but the sound of the chimes is still amazing...in fact, I just went and bought a large-sized one for the other side of the house in black. I have never heard wind chimes that sound as nice as these!
customer_reviews.author: Catalina-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Upon removing shrink-wrap... the Chimes began 🎶 to sing! Unbelievable! Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: An Outstanding and Well-built product! Sturdy and built-to-last! I could not put it down after unpacking! Holding the Chimes with one fingure through the circular support ring at the top, I need only twist the ring 1/4 turn... and the Chimes 🎵 began 🎶 to sing and reverbrate 🎵 with deep harmonizing tones... throughout my home... 🎶 as if I were in a spiritual environment! Gosh! And it L👀ks magnificent also! I got the cherry / gold. I could not be happier!!! With this product!!! Much praise goes to the creator!!! The beauty of it all... almost brought tears to my eyes. -Matthew, much thanks
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great and Holds Up to the Elements!
customer_reviews.text: I hung this wind chime outside to help scare some pigeons that would land on my roof. The sound is absolutely beautiful and while the birds do return at times, they typically fly off once they hear the chimes start ringing. They've been up for at least 2 years now and they still look and sound as great as they did when I received them. Affordable set of wind chimes and they are an absolute great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this windchime. It has a very nice sound. I didn't want one that sounded high and tinkling. This is more middle to deep tones but not entirely deep/low and has a pinch of higher. It has a pleasing balanced sound. The chimes look nice and appear well made. It's hanging on my front porch and I'm hearing it's lovely chiming right now on this breezy day.
customer_reviews.author: romperstompers

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and peaceful sound
customer_reviews.text: I have put this out on my back deck and love the sound. The sound is very soothing and peaceful. I have only had it for a week and hope it lasts a very long time! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will love these!
customer_reviews.text: These chimes are fantastic! The sounds are beautiful and they are well made. The packaging is awesome, would be a perfect gift as only a bow would be needed!
customer_reviews.author: Carol D

customer_reviews.title: Not really made for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, if gentle sound. However, the wood is not treated well for being outdoors. I have mine hanging beneath a thickly, branched tree. It has been outside for just a few months and the wood is already blackened and splitting. I think that you need to have these under cover, such as a roof, and far enough back that the elements won't reach it. That doesn't bode well for an outdoor wind chime.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Dashiell

customer_reviews.title: The Brooklyn Basix Chimes are a great product that will keep giving.
customer_reviews.text: First thing I was very impressed with the way the chimes were packaged. The packaging made me feel like I spent some serious money, but didn’t. Second the chimes were very nice quality. Third once I hung my chimes up the sound was incredible and magical it reminded me of my childhood. This is my second Brooklyn Basix chime my first was purchased over a year ago and it’s still in very nice condition considering the Texas weather. Now I can sit outside and listen to my Brooklyn Basix Chimes in stereo. Lol Highly recommend to purchase a Brooklyn Basix Chime for yourself or for a gift that will give someone magical sounds for years.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised by these. Because they were not expensive I thought they would be junk. They are not. The sound is nice and they are a decent enough size for me. There are grommets where the strings attach to the pipes. If your thinking about getting these go ahead and do it. You wont regret it.AMENDED REVIEW: its been over a year that I've had them hanging outside. THEY STILL LOOK WONDERFUL. no broken wood or any other type of problems. I bought 2 of them but somehow lost a set during the move to my new house. so im here to buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: my daughter and I will be spending more time outside and this will be perfect for us to listen to and enjoy
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to add a little home feel to our apartment patio. With spring here, my daughter and I will be spending more time outside and this will be perfect for us to listen to and enjoy. Growing up I always had wind chimes around and it makes our home feel like the one I grew up in. Just something about a wind chime! It sounds BEAUTIFUL, and looks great on our porch.
customer_reviews.author: momofthree3

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat large, but very nice wind chimes with mellow sound
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wind chimes! Not at all wimpy, but may be too large for some, depending on your situation. Was larger than others on my screen porch, so, was a bit apprehensive but once I hung them, I am very pleased. Nice mellow tones from the heavy tubes and striker/wind catcher. Due to their large size, I worried that that may be too loud, but that is not the case. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sounding chimes
customer_reviews.text: My mother came and lived with me for 9 months after she sold her home and searched for another. She really enjoyed sitting outside on my covered screened in porch listening to my tuned wind chimes. She would often read the paper and doze (especially if there was a storm approaching). Her new home has a covered and screened in porch, so I purchased this item for her deck and gave it to her on Mother's Day. She was thrilled with them! They sound wonderful, and they arrived quickly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: D. Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a year
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed these wind chimes for about a year....then they litetally fell apart. The wood split in three different places. They were hanging on my balconey. I live in Arkansas so we have all seasons. Not sure where else you would hang wind chimes besides OUTSIDE. Buyer beware if you want something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Felixia

customer_reviews.title: Rich and Vibrant
customer_reviews.text: The sound that these chimes made is magical. It's not as high-pitched and twinkly as most other chimes of equivalent size. It's rich and vibrant, making everyone turn when the wind blows to revel in its beauty. Also, kudos to Brooklyn Basix on the packaging. They sent the chimes in a beautiful and sturdy black box. We're now using the box as storage too.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh...the sound of a nice chime
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I had one of these Brooklyn Basix chimes for our house in NY. We didn't bring it with us when we moved the Florida and that was a mistake. The sounds are very nice and peaceful...not overly loud or obnoxious. We bought another for our house in Florida and we are glad we did. We have also sent one to a friend as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Berk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chimes!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a set of chimes from another company and was not happy. I returned them and after much research, I selected these. I am VERY satisfied with the quality, pitch, and sounds of my chimes. I wanted the large size, deep and beautiful tone and I got it. Lovely appearance also. They hang in my pine forest next to my guest cabin. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Mals

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple windchimes with a very pleasant tone
customer_reviews.text: Great, simple windchimes with a very pleasant tone. They're weighty enough so they're not constantly ringing, but they do chime frequently if a breeze is going. Hoping they last a while even though I have them outdoors without cover, but for the price I will consider buying them again if I need to replace them in a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: LTTaniguchiTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant sounding chime!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my parents as a gift, and I love hearing it when I'm at their house and the wind is blowing. It's not too loud, and doesn't chime at the slightest little breeze. As soon as I can figure out a place to hang it, I'll be purchasing one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: very soothing sound
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful wind chimes! I have them hanging in my yard from a tree near my hammock. The sound is very nice and soothing. Some wing chimes are loud and can get annoying after a while. There has been a breeze all week and I have the Windows open and I am really enjoying the sothing sound. They are a very good quality and the price is amazing! I was pricing similar quality chimes in the store and the price was double.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lidman

customer_reviews.title: very pretty
customer_reviews.text: wish they could be seen in the daytime, the butterfly shown was loose in the bottom of the box, washer in the globe, but will find a use for the butterfly, chimes are nice so it is enjioyable during the day.
customer_reviews.author: chriso

customer_reviews.title: BOOM!  Instant birthday,  Christmas,  baby shower  etc. gift.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful workmanship and amazing tonal quality. This is a definite must buy. I'm going to raid the piggy bank and buy a couple more for Christmas gifts. This chime is that good.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound!
customer_reviews.text: I love these chimes. My old ones were exactly like these and weathered the outside for 10 years. A gentle breeze causes them to give a lovely, soothing sound. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Debard

customer_reviews.title: sings my husband to sleep every night
customer_reviews.text: love it , we originally bought it to keep birds from pooping on my deck. but now since having a very windy winter , My husband looks forward to the tones being played so softly by the chimes every night before going to sleep. Its also great for keeping the birds from making poop on my deck. love love love it,
customer_reviews.author: jay jay

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These last a little over a year before the wood at the top began to rot and split in to pieces. The sound was awesome and the size was good. It just didn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect gift for me!
customer_reviews.text: My kids got me these wind chimes for Mother's Day. I absolutely love them! They know I like to sit on the back porch in the evening and listen to birds and watch the sun go down. So this has been a great addition to my night time ritual. They look beautiful on my back porch and have the most melodious sound. The wind has to be on the stronger to make them chime but that makes it more special because they're not constantly ringing. I loved this gift!!
customer_reviews.author: MOgle

customer_reviews.title: RE:  Revised Review.
customer_reviews.text: Got this Item , Packaging was great , took out of packaging , hung on hanging hook on deck. Sounds great , but since we bought it in April 2016, it seem to have a issue with the weather in Minnesota. The top piece of wood is splitting in the grain lines. Hoping to have them replace the chime as it carries a 100% Satisfaction Gaurrantee and 1 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging to begin with and even more impressed with the quality of the chime. Last but not least the price was much more reasonable than others out there as well. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Solanik

customer_reviews.title: Great windchimes
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are the best wind chimes I've found. They look great and sound really good. So far they have held up really well in the New England heat/humidity and cold/snow. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: The quality and sound from the wind chime are good. My daughter is also interested in purchasing a ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality and sound from the wind chime are good. My daughter is also interested in purchasing a wind chime and we have a common complaint about such devices. Without locating in a very exterior position exposed to the sun (not recommended by seller) it can be difficult to get enough wind action to activate the chiming action I have located mine in a covered porch area with wind access from two sides so I will need to have some time to see how effective sound wise the unit can be.
customer_reviews.author: Larry S

customer_reviews.title: and wind chimes are a great natural way to keep birds out of your veggies
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wind chimes for my organic urban farm. The recycled materials work perfectly with my zero-waste policy, and wind chimes are a great natural way to keep birds out of your veggies. The wind chimes' sound is even better than I'd hoped; perfectly tuned, soothing, and just lovely. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LDR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sound and good construction. If the chimes are to be used outside I recommend varnishing the wood. This are my third ones and the first is still in use after more than ten years.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Aldrey

customer_reviews.title: Best Wind Chime Ever!  Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this wind chime! Responds to wind perfectly and puts out the perfect combination of notes/tones. Super high quality and excellent value. We received a discount code after our first purchase and ended up ordering another one of these (natural wood/matte silver), which we fell in love with as well (it was supposed to be a gift, but we just couldn't let it go after seeing it in person). Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful melodies on my patio
customer_reviews.text: I must say this is one of my favorite Amazon buys. I love listen8ng to these chimes day or night. They are so subtle and calming.
customer_reviews.author: Chunky-J

customer_reviews.title: Ring the Freedom chime across the land!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this chime. It is the perfect size, the material is eco- friendly, the bamboo striker is simple and beautiful. I have it indoors right near a ceiling fan, so it randomly hits notes-- or not. The effect of the pure notes is deeply soothing and calming. I am a chime fan ( they hang on my patio, from trees, even a tiny one in the car) but this is my favorite, hands-down. And the company is great. Support this company AND our environment!
customer_reviews.author: By the beach

customer_reviews.title: Look and sound great
customer_reviews.text: Received the wind chimes and they look great. My wife loves them and the sound they make. They are right outside the kitchen widow and she says how happy they make her every night when she hears them. They look well built and hopefully they will hold up to the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sounding
customer_reviews.text: These bad boys are super! What a calming sound! I have two in my yard and I love them! Very soothing!
customer_reviews.author: JAMMAS

customer_reviews.title: Brooklyn Basix offers a great product!
customer_reviews.text: These chimes sound beautiful! They are made of quality materials and even have a mail in guarantee. I ordered the black/matt black, and love them! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeje

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality. They are the best sounding wind chimes I have ever heard. They look so nice hanging on my back porch. I love to sit on my back porch now and listen to the peaceful tones. I think I am going to purchase another one for my Mom. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Mom86

customer_reviews.title: We like the sound
customer_reviews.text: The chime looks decent considering the price. We like the sound, very soothing. Update: After one year on our deck exposed to rain, snow, wind... It breaks down.
customer_reviews.author: Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Very good Chime, like it!
customer_reviews.text: Need to prepare a gift for my loved one. I searched the chime options on amazon, and found most of them either too cheap, or high quality ones cost you a lot of money, until I found this one. It has very good reviews and I always trust the reviews. When it finally arrived, it's even better than I thought. This is a good quality chime and the price is quite reasonable. I think I will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chengwen

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful set, arrived in a true package (like something you'd get in person), nicely wrapped in a pretty box ... great sound and workmanship ... it comes with a warranty, which I will register - so far very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ravin DeStorm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sounds,  beautiful chimes.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chimes and very calm sounds. My old chimes sounded rough, not smooth and calming. I hope that they last as long as my old ones did. Great price, looks and sounds beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Stljodi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Right from the box, the wind chime was easy to set up. The sound that resonate from the chimes are beautiful and the bars are of great quality. My little one is fascinated with the wind chimes at our local gardening store but the prices are so unreasonable. I was happy to get this one that was just as beautiful and just as nice for our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: mominLA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made.. the sound is just so soothing. We both the larger size. It is heavy enough to not sway unnecessarily. The wind has to put some effort. Beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.author: brijita chambayil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: It has a beautiful tone. The color on the tubes doesn't go all the way to the bottom - so that detracts from the beauty but not enough for me to return them. I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: These chimes are the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Timing was perfect. When I received theses the wind was up and the chimes sound beautifully! They were packaged very well and exceeded my expectations! Great quality! I expect them to last many years! Makes sitting outside so calming and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H

customer_reviews.title: Only one thing missing
customer_reviews.text: great packaging, product came as advertised. Only problem is it's summer in south Texas. There's no wind :(
customer_reviews.author: Robusto

customer_reviews.title: Chimes for my deck
customer_reviews.text: The item was nicely and professionally packaged. Out of the box, the chimes were singing a nice melody. This was a perfect size for my deck. I can't wait to listen to these chimes for years. Good price and value.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Waite

customer_reviews.title: The tones the wind chime makes is so beautiful. They are in perfect harmony when it chimes ...
customer_reviews.text: The tones the wind chime makes is so beautiful. They are in perfect harmony when it chimes in a gentle breeze. I am extremely happy with my purchase and expect for them to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: You Are Gonna Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a Birthday Gift. I got a phone call, on the other end of the phone were these chimes ringing...She loved them. I loved them. And she said they were beautiful as well as the sound being so pretty, which it was!! I was actually convinced to purchase this certain Chime because of a review posted with the actual product by one of the customers.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Faint chime.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful wind chimes, and have a lovely sound. My problem was that even with a stiff breeze, they hardly chimed. When they did, the sound was very faint, so not much pleasure from them.
customer_reviews.author: AmesIsland

customer_reviews.title: It has held up well!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. I bought it for my father in law for Christmas and I just saw it today for the first time since and it still looks like new. We live in Florida so this thing goes through plenty of rainfall. It has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jahnella

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: We have several chimes. Love the sound of them and these are a great addition
customer_reviews.author: Randy E Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these wind chimes. They are a great size and the sound is wonderful. I will absolutely buy another one
customer_reviews.author: S. Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound, not perfect. Will last longer if brought inside during rain/snow or kept in covered area. Beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.author: Keira Ranson

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made the purchase !
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted and proud to have it on my deck😋.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Great chimes!
customer_reviews.text: Very well packed. Great sounds and good size. Would recommend. Going to order another one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for 🙂
customer_reviews.text: This wind chime is amazing! I expected crap for the price but it sounds beautiful and looks great. Such s happy sounding chime!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Danielson

customer_reviews.title: love the sounds
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, love the sounds. I agree with the other reviewers, crazy good for that price. I love wind chimes but they are usually so expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Monkey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and sounds beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and sounds beautiful.....they offer a 10% off upon registration and I plan on getting another one for "ME"....this was a gift and I was very impressed with how well it's made and how nice it sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: Such beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my wind chime. I hung it on my front porch this evening and it sounds beautiful. This product does not dissapoint. It is constructed well and with quality materials. I am going to buy one for my parents and perhaps a few more for me.
customer_reviews.author: iTeach

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Wood turns black after a couple months, and will completely fall apart with 4-5 months. This product says it is sutiable for outside use, but that is complelty untrue. PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: I paid full price for them through Amazon and I can tell you they are a fabulous buy for the money - good quality.....
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the people writing the stellar reviews were writing them because they received the chimes for free. Well, that's not the case! I paid full price for them through Amazon and I can tell you they are a fabulous buy for the money - good quality - excellent sound - good value. Don't hesitate to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Love the wind chimes! Helps keep the birds at bay preventing "nesting" in my back yard!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine B. Temple

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and calming tones
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I've been wanting a wind chime for a while, and I was about to buy a Woodstock wind chime for ~$50. Then I saw this one for half the price and thought I would take a chance on it. So glad I did. It simple but well made and I absolutely love the sound it makes. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: TEK

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Such a beautiful sound. I hung it outside of my window. It's so relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Irk

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chimes, beautiful sound. Great quality. What else can I say? Definitely worth the price and so glad I chose these over the others I was looking at.
customer_reviews.author: Torri Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chimes at a very nice price
customer_reviews.text: These are great wind chimes. They have a really lovely tone. Not too high. They look and chime like far more expensive chimes but at a really good price. It doesn't take too much breeze to get a beautiful sound from them. I am very happy with my purchase and would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: VirginiaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Wow! A Melody to My Ears!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a beautiful sounding wind chime! I had no idea they could sound this lovely and harmonious. Every time there is a breeze in my backyard, I'm treated to a melodic windsong. I like them so much that these chimes may have just become my go-to housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Waffles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and beautiful. The sound is out of this world. Have recommended to everyone who loves windchimes.
customer_reviews.author: kareenajoe

customer_reviews.title: Why?
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful hanging outside my bedroom slider. Why am I just now buying wonderful wind chimes? Great quality, beautiful sound---I'm kicking myself for not buying earlier! Company seems great and offer a 10% discount if you register product. I'm going to buy at least two more sets as gifts-in-waiting.
customer_reviews.author: C. Aurora

customer_reviews.title: sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems good, but it's a little small comparing to what we had before, wish we had ordered the larder size.
customer_reviews.author: No free or discounted reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Glorious!
customer_reviews.text: These wind chimes sound glorious, very rich lower tones that don't sound tinny or cheaply made. I hung them up right away by the pool area - just wish we had more wind!! These wind chimes would make a lovely gift. I'm very impressed. I wasn't going to order them because I thought the sound would get next to me but to me they have a church like organ type quality. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Sneauxfrē

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself and one as a gift. They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: B. M. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the fast shipment of this beautiful item.
customer_reviews.author: GOVikings

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother in law for mother's day she loved it. Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.author: christina mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! The sound is beautiful but not overwhelming. Bought 3, am going to get 2 more! I am hoping they will stand up to the winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: ZacharyKindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with appearance and sound. Love it and plan to purchase one for a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality made chimes!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chimes and beautiful sounds. Not harsh or "twangy" like I've heard from others. This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it. These are identical to ones that I rec'd as a gift and I love mine. You won't be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: VERY WELL MADE AND GREAT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful well made chime.The sounds are awesome and very soothing.This CHIME is considerably better and more well MADE than others I've purchased ON amazon.Also comes well packaged in a beautiful BLACK BOX.
customer_reviews.author: Get the LED OUT

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice wind chime for the money..... sound is nice and clear and relaxing...... We are still looking for a low pitch chime
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds fantastic. My only issues is the one we got was a bit crooked hanging I tried straightening it. The other is the wood got moldy within a week in North Carolina, never seen that before.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bickford

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Wind Chime
customer_reviews.text: This wind chime is quality crafted and makes a lovely sound when a breeze is present. The packaging is superb and would qualify for a great gift for a friend or relative who enjoy their outdoor areas of their home. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wind chime
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful full sound, not tinkly like some wind chimes. Attractive, seems durable and well-made. Mine came with a discount code for another one, so I bought one as a gift for my sister, and she loves hers too!
customer_reviews.author: contranym

customer_reviews.title: Wood pieces don't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sound of my chimes. I was very careful and brought them in during high winds. I packed them on the nice box during the cold months. After two years the wood orts have completely fallen apart like so many others have shown. The chimes are still in great condition and sounded great until last week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this and the sounds with a little bit of wind. I had one a long time ago and it got misplaced in a move. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Crazy for chimes
customer_reviews.text: I love wind chimes so any text I get a new one I'm over the moon plus the price was right ..looking at other chime from u in the future
customer_reviews.author: reader99

customer_reviews.title: The chimes are lovely I am so very pleased I ordered them
customer_reviews.text: The chimes are lovely I am so very pleased I ordered them. They arrived on time were very easy to hang and have a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: elaine mcgann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound from these wind chimes.
customer_reviews.text: Update (July 4, 2017): Did not last 2 summer seasons. Sun and rain caused wood to dry out and crack in two pieces. Well made, simple clean design, perfectly packaged, no assembly required, and most important of all they sound beautiful. A very good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, beautifully tuned. Got one for a friend and one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Carol F. Neuwirth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mother's day gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a mother's day present and mom loves them! They have a nice color and produce a beautiful, full sound.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLo

customer_reviews.title: Product is perfect, well made and well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect, well made and well packaged. The sound is very nice and my wife loved it for Mother's day! If I ever want another wind chime I will be sure to go to Amazon for Brooklyn Basix. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Another Guy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality construction--do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The tone is fantastic, but after only a year the entire top split in half and the chimes are hanging in disarray. I messaged the manufacturer and received no response.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wind Chimes
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I ordered two so I could hang one on each end of my covered front porch! My neighbors are already asking where I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: N. Collins

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SOUNDING
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to drown out the noise of a neighbors wooden clacking wind chimes that were driving me nuts! LOL! Why pay $1,300 or more for a set of wind chimes; when this set sounds awesome for less than the price of a meal out!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The sound is beautiful. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Anne~1536

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound and design
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound and design. Really happy with this purchase. Hung them on a nice outdoor hook I found in the garden center at Home Depot for $4.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

product_meta.title: Brooklyn Basix Freedom Chime for Patio, Garden, Terrace and Balcony - Beautiful Outdoor Decor - Easy to Install Wind Chimes - Durable and Hand Tuned (Natural/Matte Silver, Medium 29")
product_meta.description:
THE ECO-FRIENDLY FREEDOM CHIME! 

Unlock the Ambiance of your Outdoor Living Experience Now! 
- Are you seeking to add another layer of beauty to your outdoor space? 
- Tired of annoying background noises on your balcony or patio? 
- Are you in need of relaxation after a long day? 

Presenting the Freedom Chime! Let Freedom Ring! 
- Mid-sized wind chime for indoor and outdoor use - see overall dimensions in image 2 above 
- Mask unwanted background noises with resonating harmonies 
- Produce relaxing tunes to soothe your body and soul 
- Welcome your guest with beautiful melodies 
- Perfect feature for a zen garden or other garden design ideas 
- An effective feng shui element to harness positive chi 
- A perfect gift for friends and family, for any occasion 

Professionally designed with High Quality materials to ensure 100% Customer Satisfaction! 
- All wood components constructed of bamboo 
- Strung with durable suspension cords - see image 3 above 
- Chimes are durable hollow recycled aluminum tubes with sandblasted finish - see image 4 above 
- Includes secure aluminum suspension ring 
- Features a removable windcatcher for easy customization, engraving or replacement 

Click "Add to Cart" NOW to get Your Eco Friendly Wind Chime and Enhance your Outdoor Experience & Décor!
feature_bullets: ECO FRIENDLY CLASSIC MID-SIZED WIND CHIME utilizing high quality recyclable, renewable & sustainable materials
BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED AND PRECISELY TUNED aural ornament produces relaxing tunes to soothe your body and soul
ALL WOOD COMPONENTS are constructed of renewable laminated bamboo with six durable sandblasted hollow recycled aluminum tubes
MAKES A PERFECT GIFT - Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. These chimes make a great gift for all occasions. NOTE: Indoor chime placement should be close to a breeze for best experience
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE and backed by one year warranty
